Control.name: reg_only_mat
Control.desc: reg_only_mat : // unsigned , default = 0 ,only use input matrix ,work when hdr disable

Control.name: mat_o_en
Control.desc: mat_o_en,//output matrix enable ,only work when hdr enable

Control.name: mat_in_en
Control.desc: mat_in_en //input matrix enable ,only work when hdr enable

Control.name: clk_tm
Control.desc: clk_tm : gate clock ctrl (main clock) // unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: output
Control.desc: output : matrix clock gate ctrl // unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: input
Control.desc: input : matrix clock gate ctrl // unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: hdr
Control.desc: hdr : top cbus clock gate ctrl // unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: eotf
Control.desc: eotf : cbus clock gate ctrl // unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: oetf
Control.desc: oetf : cbus clock gate ctrl // unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: gamma
Control.desc: gamma : mult cbus clock gate ctrl // unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: adaptive
Control.desc: adaptive : cbus scaler clock gate ctrl // unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: cgain
Control.desc: cgain : cbus clock gate ctrl // unsigned , default = 0
